title: (x) The Making of Casablanca calligraphic serif caps - Pompeii Capitals {Yves}
content:
I need to ID this serif font and I hope the resident experts here can help. Anyone?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141203090731im_/http:/typophile.com/files/casa_3455.gif)
author: Tonie Blaze

comments.content: The typical calligraphic strokes yelled [Philip Bouwsma](http://web.archive.org/web/20141203090731/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Philip%20Bouwsma) to me, and see -- it's [Pompeii Capitals](http://web.archive.org/web/20141203090731/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/pompeii_capitals/?sample_text=THE%20MAKING%20OF%20CASSABLANCA&sample_size=36). ;^)
